book.title: Rackspace Cloud Block Storage Release Notes

annotation.remark: Copyright details are filled in by the template.

abstract.para: This document is intended for software developers who are interested in developing applications using the Rackspace Cloud Block Storage Application Programming Interface (API).

revdescription.para: Fixed a bug in Cloud Block Storage that was introduced in the Cinder Volume Manager deployments on January 27, 2015 and January 29, 2015. When size="100" was used for the create volume operation, the value was not properly converted to an integer. This issue resulted in a response code of 400.

Added information and links about multi-factor authentication in the following documents:
“Generating an authentication token”
“Authentication”
Added 412 for invalidImage to the table of faults in “Faults”.

listitem.para: Added the imageRef request parameter to the create volume operation. Use this parameter for the boot from volume capability. The corresponding response parameter is image_id.
Updated the default quotas in “Cloud Block Storage quotas”.

revdescription.para: Added the section Cloud Block Storage quotas to the Cloud Block Storage Developer Guide to provide information about Cloud Block Storage quotas and how to list quota information.

In the "Service access endpoints" sections in the Cloud Block Storage Getting Started Guide and in the Cloud Block Storage Developer Guide, added a link to the Knowledge Center article About Regions to provide guidance on choosing a regionalized endpoint.
Published the new Cloud Block Storage Getting Started Guide for the API. The example requests in this guide use cURL.
Added the version and tenant ID to URIs in the API operations chapter of the Cloud Block Storage Developer Guide.
Added the availability_zone and metadata request parameter descriptions to the create volume operation description in the API operations chapter.

listitem.para: Added the list volumes (detailed) operation description to the Volumes section of the API operations chapter.
Added the list snapshots (detailed) operation description to the Snapshots section of the API operations chapter.

revdescription.para: Updated the show snapshot details operation description to mention the progress indicator, os-extended-snapshot-attributes:progress, and show it in the example responses.

listitem.para: Added the volume cloning capability that allows you to create a new Cloud Block Storage volume from an existing volume by adding the source_volid parameter to the create volume operation.
Updated the instructions for locating the API key, tenant ID, and account number in the Cloud Control Panel in the Authentication section.
Added RBAC.
Updated the service access endpoints.
Added the update volume operation.

Updated the size parameter description for create volume operation because the way creating a volume from a snapshot changed. The API for creating a volume from a snapshot was ignoring the size parameter and was creating a volume the same size as the snapshot. Now the volume size must be greater than the snapshot size.
Updated the create snapshot operation description adding information about snapshot progress. The progress is visible in the os-extended-snapshot-attributes:progress field of the snapshot.
Moved the definitions of terms formally in the Concepts section to the glossary and renamed the Concepts section to Terminology.

preface.title: Preface
preface.para: This document describes new features and changes for the Cloud Block Storage API.

For detailed information about the Cloud Block Storage API, see the following guides at docs.rackspace.com:
Cloud Block Storage Getting Started Guide
Cloud Block Storage Developer Guide
Support for Cloud Block Storage is available 24x7x365 via phone or chat, or by filing a ticket. For more information, see Rackspace Cloud Essentials - Getting Fanatical Support.
You can also provide feedback by using the Product Feedback forum.
Rackspace welcomes your comments, feedback, and bug reports.

chapter.title: Document change history
chapter.para: This version of the release notes replaces and obsoletes all earlier versions. The most recent changes are described in the following table:

chapter.title: February 10, 2015
chapter.para: This release includes the following change for the Cloud Block Storage API.

listitem.para: Fixed a bug in Cloud Block Storage that was introduced in the Cinder Volume Manager deployments on January 27, 2015 and January 29, 2015. When size="100" was used for the create volume operation, the value was not properly converted to an integer. This issue resulted in a response code of 400.

chapter.title: January 14, 2015
chapter.para: This release includes the following change for the Cloud Block Storage API.

listitem.para:
Added information and links about multi-factor authentication in the following documents:
“Generating an authentication token”
“Authentication”

chapter.title: December 29, 2014
chapter.para: This release includes the following change for the Cloud Block Storage API.

listitem.para: Added 412 for invalidImage to the table of faults in “Faults”.

chapter.title: October 9, 2014
chapter.para: This release includes the following changes for the Cloud Block Storage API.

listitem.para: Added the imageRef request parameter and the image_id response parameter to the create volume operation to support the boot from volume capability.
Updated the default quotas.

In the Cloud Block Storage Developer Guide, added the imageRef request parameter to the create volume operation. Use this parameter for the boot from volume capability. The corresponding response parameter is image_id. For more information about this feature, see the Knowledge Center article, "How to boot a server from a Cloud Block Storage volume."
Updated the default quotas in “Cloud Block Storage quotas”.

chapter.title: August 22, 2014
chapter.para: This release includes the following changes for the Cloud Block Storage API.

listitem.para: In the Cloud Block Storage Developer Guide, added the section Cloud Block Storage quotas to provide information about Cloud Block Storage quotas and how to list quota information.

chapter.title: July 22, 2014
chapter.para: This release includes the following changes for the Cloud Block Storage API.

listitem.para: In the "Service access endpoints" sections in the Cloud Block Storage Getting Started Guide and in the Cloud Block Storage Developer Guide, added a link to the Knowledge Center article About Regions to provide guidance on choosing a regionalized endpoint.

chapter.title: June 12, 2014
chapter.para: This release contains documentation changes for the Cloud Block Storage API.

listitem.para: Published the new Cloud Block Storage Getting Started Guide for the API. The example requests in this guide use cURL.

chapter.title: March 12, 2014
chapter.para: This release contains documentation changes for the Cloud Block Storage API.

listitem.para: Added the version and tenant ID to URIs in the API operations chapter of the Cloud Block Storage Developer Guide.

chapter.title: February 10, 2014
chapter.para: This release contains documentation changes for the Cloud Block Storage API.

listitem.para: Added the availability_zone and metadata request parameter descriptions to the create volume operation description in the API operations chapter.

chapter.title: February 6, 2014
chapter.para: This release contains documentation changes for the Cloud Block Storage API.

listitem.para: Added the list volumes (detailed) operation description in the Volumes section of the API operations chapter.
Added the list snapshots (detailed) operation description in the Snapshots section of the API operations chapter.

chapter.title: January 28, 2014
chapter.para: This release contains documentation changes for the Cloud Block Storage API.

listitem.para: Updated the description of the show snapshot details operation in the API operations chapter to include the progress indicator, os-extended-snapshot-attributes:progress, and show it in the example responses.

chapter.title: January 2, 2014
chapter.para: This release contains new features and documentation changes for the Cloud Block Storage API.

listitem.para: Added the volume cloning capability that allows you to create a new Cloud Block Storage volume from an existing volume by adding the source_volid parameter to the create volume operation.
Updated the documentation to include new information based on the addition of the source_volid parameter to the create volume operation.

chapter.title: October 21, 2013
chapter.para: This release contains new features for the Cloud Block Storage API.

listitem.para: Added the HKG service endpoint.

chapter.title: October 3, 2013
chapter.para: This release contains new features for the Cloud Block Storage API.

listitem.para: Added RBAC.
Updated the service access endpoints.

chapter.title: August 9, 2013
chapter.para: This release contains new features and documentation changes for the Cloud Block Storage API.

listitem.para: Added the update volume operation.
For the create snapshot operation, added snapshot progress. The progress is visible in the "os-extended-snapshot-attributes:progress" field of the snapshot.

For the create volume operation, changed the way creating a volume from a snapshot works. The API for creating a volume from a snapshot was ignoring the size parameter and was creating a volume the same size as the snapshot. Now the volume size must be greater than the snapshot size.
Moved the definitions of terms formally in the Concepts section to the Glossary and renamed the Concepts section to Terminology.

chapter.title: January 4, 2013
chapter.para: This release contains enhancements, resolved issues, and documentation changes for Cloud Block Storage.

listitem.para: Removed camel-case for JSON examples.

chapter.title: October 23, 2012
chapter.para: This is the first public release for Cloud Block Storage.
